styles: .main-ul{list-style:none;padding:0;position:relative;margin-top:2px}ul li{display:none;position:relative}ul li a{position:relative}ul li>a:after{content:"\e99a";font-family:material;display:inline-block;top:16px;right:15px;position:absolute;font-size:23px;left:auto;-webkit-transition:-webkit-transform .3s;transition:-webkit-transform .3s;transition:transform .3s;transition:transform .3s,-webkit-transform .3s}ul li.opened>a:after{-webkit-transform:rotate(90deg);transform:rotate(90deg)}ul li>a:only-child:after{content:"";border:0}.main-ul>li{display:block}.main-ul>li.opened{background:#f7f7f7;border-left:3px solid #4c84ff}.main-ul>li.opened .child-ul{background:#f9f9f9}.main-ul>li>a:hover{background:#f7f7f7!important}.main-ul li i[class^=icon-]{font-size:22px;padding-right:5px;text-align:center;color:#aaa}.main-ul li a{display:block;font-weight:400;padding:16px 20px;color:#717171;text-decoration:none}.main-ul li.opened>a{color:#4c84ff!important}.main-ul li.opened>ngx-sidebar>.child-ul>li{display:block!important}.child-ul{padding-left:10px;display:none}.main-ul li.opened>ngx-sidebar>.child-ul{display:block!important}.child-ul>li{position:relative}.child-ul>li:hover>a{color:#4c84ff}
